text:
Keep the feedback coming!

We’re still catching up from the holidays. Just because we haven’t responded, doesn’t mean we haven’t read the feedback ya’ll are submitting. As a reminder too - posting your idea to the idea forums allows other folks to upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters gauge demand for functionality, which influences prioritization. There’s a link atop this channel to the <https://ideas.HubSpot.com/|idea forums>.
I usually just use a theme field that I have mapped to a custom property in that context
But your idea would be pretty sweet. How would the color picker in the dnd editor show this, though?
we have a dark/light mode site in the works using a design system, and it has limited us to flexible column/row modules because of the dnd editor’s limitations and the dnd editors flexibility lol
